issue.title: [CF 664] Req: Percentage of duration
issue.body:
I'd like to be able to write conditions based on the percentage of duration remaining of a DOT for spells that don't have a consistent duration.


> Posted by CurseForge user DaveE | Imported from CurseForge issue #664 | Raw

comments.body:
Added conditions for this in r671


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
